interactivity.requirements: Saturday 20 Ayane Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Endless Torment " from Ayane Amamiya Seen " Less Like the Vulture " from Ayane Amamiya Seen " Shaking The Tree " from Sana Sakakibara

progression.synopsis: Ayane has been crying, and apologizes for looking "ugly". She doesn't want to talk about what is wrong, and instead makes a joke about being pregnant. Sensei is alarmed, and Ayane asks whether it would really be so bad. She tells Sensei that he's all she has, and that even though saying so makes her sound crazy, she is "addicted" to him. She asks if he remembers the first time she broke down in front of him, when he comforted her after her mother had moved out and told her that he would always be there for her. Now, with her father ignoring her, she feels that there is no one to look after her anymore. Sensei tells her that he'll keep visiting as much as he can. She asks him to sleep next to her overnight, even though Sana is certain to notice. If he agrees, Sana accepts his explanation.
trivia: During the beach trip Sana scene change

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
